Code Smell Detector

class code_quality_analyzer.code_smell_detector.CodeSmell(name: str, description: str, file_path: str, module_class: str, line_number: int, severity: str = '')[source]

Bases: object

severity: str = ''
class code_quality_analyzer.code_smell_detector.CodeSmellDetector(thresholds)[source]

Bases: object

A class to detect various code smells in Python source code.

This class analyzes Python source code for common code smells and anti-patterns, providing a comprehensive report on potential issues in the codebase.

code_smells

A list to store detected code smells.

Type:

list

thresholds

A dictionary of threshold values for various code smell detections.

Type:

dict

file_content

A list of strings representing the content of the analyzed file.

Type:

list

add_smell(name, description, file_path, module_class, line_number=None, severity='medium')[source]

Add a detected smell to the list of code smells.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the smell

  • description (str) – Description of the smell

  • file_path (str) – Path to the file containing the smell

  • module_class (str) – The module or class containing the smell

  • line_number (int, optional) – The line number where the smell was detected

  • severity (str, optional) – The severity level of the smell (default: ‘medium’)

detect_alternative_classes(module, file_path)[source]

Detect alternative classes with different interfaces in the given module.

Detect excessive comments in the given file.

Detect data classes in the given module.

detect_shotgun_surgery(module, file_path)[source]

Detect potential shotgun surgery in the given module.

detect_smells(file_path)[source]

Detect code smells in the given file.

This method reads the file, parses it using astroid, and runs all the smell detection methods. If a parse error occurs, it prints the error message and continues with the analysis.

Parameters:

file_path (str) – The path to the file to be analyzed.

detect_speculative_generality(module, file_path)[source]

Detect speculative generality in the given module.

detect_switch_statements(module, file_path)[source]

Detect switch statements in the given module.

detect_temporary_fields(module, file_path)[source]

Detect temporary fields in the given module.

print_report()[source]

Print a report of all detected code smells.

If no code smells are detected, it prints a message indicating so.
